root.name: Crash 'n Burn
root.description: GameplayPlayers take control of their choice of 6 different types of racing punk. Car upgrades and weapons can be purchased between races. you may also view Full Motion Video of each racer, insulting and threatening each other like WWF wrestlers... er I mean WWE.HistoryCrash and Burn was the very first game released for 3D0 and became so popular that the next year it became a pack-in game for the system.
